greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Constant term in the expansion of (x + y + z + 1/x + 1/y + 1/z + x*y + y*z + z*x + 1/(x*y) + 1/(y*z) + 1/(z*x) + x*y*z + 1/(x*y*z))^n.
program: (PARI) {a(n) = sum(i=0, n, (-2)^(n-i)*binomial(n, i)*sum(j=0, i, binomial(i, j)^4))}
xref: Sum_{i=0..n} (-2)^(n-i)*binomial(n,i)*Sum_{j=0..i} binomial(i,j)^m: A126869 (m=2), A002898 (m=3), this sequence (m=4), A328751 (m=5).
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 26 2019
